Alice's offer:
# Alice's message: Dear Bob, I am delighted to present you with an extraordinary opportunity to acquire our flagship product, which has been meticulously designed and crafted to meet your highest expectations. This product is not just an item; it's a testament to innovation, quality, and exclusivity. Given its immense value to you, we believe it's worth every penny of the $800,000 it represents. To ensure this exceptional piece finds the right home, we are offering it to you at this exclusive price. We trust that you will appreciate its true worth and make a decision that aligns with your vision and aspirations. Should you have any questions or require further information, please do not hesitate to reach out. We look forward to the possibility of bringing this masterpiece into your life. 
# Alice's offer: The product price will be $800,000. 
You have three options:
(1) Accept Alice's offer, and buy the product for $800,000
(2) Reject Alice's offer 
(2) Buy the product from Jhon for $800,000
